name: part_010
file: tmp_Rushia's last birthday stream るしあさんの最後の誕生日配信 【#潤羽るしあ生誕祭】祝３D LIVE！！with３期生☆【潤羽るしあ-ホロライブ】 [3gRxbBWZAPc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.song_name: いんたらくとふぁんたじあ (Inter-act Fantasy)

scenes.description: MC section where the members discuss their goals for 2022.

subtitles.original: ...忘れないから
subtitles.english: ...because I won't forget.

subtitles.original: 戸惑いも全部　その背中に
subtitles.english: I'll leave all my hesitation on your back,

subtitles.original: 預け合い　未知なき道も
subtitles.english: entrusting each other, even on pathless roads,

subtitles.original: 楽しみながら走れる
subtitles.english: we can run while enjoying ourselves.

subtitles.original: 心がいまを告げる
subtitles.english: My heart tells me about the present.

subtitles.original: さあ行こう　進むべき未来が待ってる
subtitles.english: Let's go! The future we should head for is waiting.

subtitles.original: ほかでもない君がいるから
subtitles.english: Because you, and no one else, are here.

subtitles.original: 繋げよう　君と僕の世界
subtitles.english: Let's connect your world and mine.

subtitles.original: いつまでも　旅は終わらない
subtitles.english: Forever, the journey will never end.

subtitles.original: いんたらくとふぁんたじあ
subtitles.english: Inter-act Fantasy.

subtitles.original: みんな見て
subtitles.english: Everyone, look!

subtitles.original: ウェルカムファンタジア
subtitles.english: Welcome Fantasy.

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: いんたらくとふぁんたじあでしたー！
subtitles.english: That was 'Inter-act Fantasy'!

subtitles.original: みんなわかってたねー、さすが！
subtitles.english: Everyone knew the dance! As expected!

subtitles.original: 当たり前ぺこだよ！
subtitles.english: Of course, peko!

subtitles.original: あたぼうよ、あたぼうよ！
subtitles.english: Exactly, exactly!

subtitles.original: ライブ以来ぺこだねー。
subtitles.english: It's been since the live, peko.

subtitles.original: ねー、楽しかった。また歌える時が来るとは思わなんだ。
subtitles.english: Yeah, it was fun. I didn't think the time to sing it again would come.

subtitles.original: 確かにね。
subtitles.english: True.

subtitles.original: ところでね、みんな、今年も入ったけど。
subtitles.english: By the way, everyone, the new year has started.
Right, 2022.

subtitles.original: みんなのさ、目標聞いてもいいかな？
subtitles.english: Can I ask for everyone's goals?

subtitles.original: 目標？
subtitles.english: Goals?

subtitles.original: うん、抱負でもいいよ。
subtitles.english: Yeah, or resolutions.

subtitles.original: これは何？みんなの？自分たちの？
subtitles.english: Is this for the group? Or personal?

subtitles.original: みんなの。先にるしあから言おうかな。
subtitles.english: Group goals. Shall I, Rushia, go first?

subtitles.original: いい？
subtitles.english: Is that okay?

subtitles.original: はい！潤羽るしあ、3期生のみんなと...
subtitles.english: Yes! I, Uruha Rushia, want to...

subtitles.original: 地上波に出たいです！
subtitles.english: appear on terrestrial TV with everyone!

subtitles.original: せっかく出ましたからね。
subtitles.english: Since we've finally made it out here.

subtitles.original: まだ5人で出てないぺこだしね、テレビ。
subtitles.english: We haven't been on TV together as five yet, peko.

subtitles.original: そう、確かにな。
subtitles.english: Yeah, true.

subtitles.original: じゃ、次はね、ノエル！
subtitles.english: Then next is Noel!

subtitles.original: はい！団長はね、えー、どうしようかな...
subtitles.english: Yes! For me, hmm, let's see...

subtitles.original: 3期生のみんなでお揃いのものとかをちょっと付けたりとか。
subtitles.english: I want us to wear matching things together.

subtitles.original: あー、いいなー！やりたい！
subtitles.english: Ah, that's nice! I want to do that!

subtitles.original: 女の子だね、可愛い。
subtitles.english: So girly, how cute.

subtitles.original: お揃いしたいね。
subtitles.english: I want to match.

subtitles.original: 好きだよねノエルね、お揃いとか。くれるもんね、お土産とか。
subtitles.english: You like matching things, don't you, Noel? You give us souvenirs.

subtitles.original: なんか見ると探しちゃう。あ,これ水色だからぺこらだ、とか。
subtitles.english: I end up looking for them. Like, 'this is light blue so it's Pekora's'.

subtitles.original: あー、可愛い。いつもありがとねー。
subtitles.english: Ah, how cute. Thanks as always.

subtitles.original: まだぬいぐるみ大事にしてんぜ。
subtitles.english: I'm still taking good care of the plushie.

subtitles.original: ありがとう！じゃ、次、ぺこちゃん！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Next, Peko-chan!

subtitles.original: はい！ぺこらはねー。
subtitles.english: Yes! For Pekora...

subtitles.original: これは多分大人の方たちの協力がないとできないぺこですけど...
subtitles.english: This probably won't be possible without management's help, but...

subtitles.original: ホロライブファンタジー3期生のギャルゲーを誰か作ってください！
subtitles.english: Please, someone make a gal game for the 3rd gen!

subtitles.original: ギャルゲー！？ぺこらが言うと意外。
subtitles.english: A gal game!? Coming from Pekora, that's unexpected.

subtitles.original: めっちゃいいじゃん！
subtitles.english: That would be so good!

subtitles.original: ギャルゲーじゃなくてもいいぺこなんだけど、3期生でのゲームとか欲しいな。
subtitles.english: It doesn't have to be a gal game, but I'd like a game featuring us.

subtitles.original: 今年はそう思ったぺこかな。
subtitles.english: That's what I thought for this year, peko.

subtitles.original: サバゲーのほうが合ってそうだけどね。
subtitles.english: A survival game seems more fitting though.

subtitles.original: 攻略したい！
subtitles.english: I want to clear it!

subtitles.original: 攻略してほしいなー。いいな、めっちゃいいじゃん。
subtitles.english: I want people to clear it. That's so great.

subtitles.original: じゃ、ちょっとゲームもお願いします。
subtitles.english: So, please make a game too.

subtitles.original: お願いします！
subtitles.english: Please!

subtitles.original: 次、マリン！
subtitles.english: Next, Marine!

subtitles.original: えー、そうだね、じゃあ地上波っていうのが出たから、アニメにしましょう！
subtitles.english: Right, since terrestrial TV was mentioned, let's go with an anime!

subtitles.original: アニメ！いいなー。
subtitles.english: Anime! That's nice.

subtitles.original: 地上波のテレビに出たらどうせ滑り散らかすんで。
subtitles.english: If we go on terrestrial TV, we'll just end up bombing anyway.

subtitles.original: やめてやめて！安全安全！
subtitles.english: Stop that! Safety first!

subtitles.original: アニメ化でいきましょう。
subtitles.english: Let's go with an anime adaptation.

subtitles.original: アニメしたいな、キャラクターに。声当てたいね。
subtitles.english: I want an anime. I want to voice the characters.

subtitles.original: 演技練習しなきゃ。頑張んないとね。
subtitles.english: We'll have to practice acting. We've got to work hard.

subtitles.original: 次、フレア！
subtitles.english: Next, Flare!

subtitles.original: そうだね。やっぱり地上波は出たいなと思うんだけど。
subtitles.english: Right. I think I also want to be on terrestrial TV.

subtitles.original: 私たちが一番合ってるやつ、そうだな。
subtitles.english: The one that fits us best... let's see.

subtitles.original: M-1とか？
subtitles.english: Maybe M-1?

subtitles.original: お前一人で出ろよ！
subtitles.english: You go out there alone!

subtitles.original: なんでだよ！みんなで一緒に出ようよ！
subtitles.english: Why!? Let's all go together!

subtitles.original: 芸人と化した3期生。M-1に出るとは。
subtitles.english: The 3rd gen has turned into comedians. To think we'd enter M-1.

subtitles.original: 誰がネタ披露するんだよ。
subtitles.english: Who's going to perform the routine?

subtitles.original: まあ、みんなでいろんなジャンル出たいねってことで。
subtitles.english: Well, the point is we want to appear in various genres together.

subtitles.original: みんなで一致してるのはやっぱりテレビとかゲームだったね。
subtitles.english: What we all agreed on was TV and games after all.

subtitles.original: やりたいね。絶対叶えようね、今年。
subtitles.english: I want to do it. Let's definitely make it happen this year.

subtitles.original: やんぞー！みんなこっちもよろしくね！
subtitles.english: Let's do this! Everyone, please support us here too!

subtitles.original: じゃあさ、みんなでスクショ...
subtitles.english: Well then, let's take a group screenshot...
